Saradomin Braziers can be found inside of the Hallowed Sepulchre on floor 2 or lower. The player can offer two piles of vampyre dust to pass through the holy barrier and loot the coffin. Offering the dust at the brazier requires 54 Prayer and awards 200 experience. Crossing the holy barrier will reward the player either 50 or 75 Agility experience depending on the floor, with experience being given for crossing both ways. The barrier can be crossed multiple times, but experience is only awarded on the first crossing and return. After the timer runs out, the brazier can no longer be lit, but can still be crossed for Agility experience if previously activated.

If equipped, the hallowed symbol will reduce the amount of vampyre dust needed from two to one.

'''Saradomin Braziers''' can be found inside of the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]] on floor 2 or lower. The player can offer two piles of [[vampyre dust]] to pass through the [[holy barrier (Hallowed Sepulchre)|holy barrier]] and loot the [[Coffin (Hallowed Sepulchre)|coffin]]. Offering the dust at the brazier requires 54 {{SCP|Prayer|link=yes}} and awards 200 [[experience]]. Crossing the holy barrier will reward the player either 50 or 75 {{SCP|Agility|link=yes}} experience depending on the floor, with experience being given for crossing both ways. The barrier can be crossed multiple times, but experience is only awarded on the first crossing and return. After the timer runs out, the brazier can no longer be lit, but can still be crossed for Agility experience if previously activated.

If equipped, the [[hallowed symbol]] will reduce the amount of [[vampyre dust]] needed from two to one.
